details.name: Lloyd
details.description: I'm a believer in Sasquatch now and have been since 1973 when my wife and I saw the big guy on our honeymoon.

details.name: Natasha
details.description: I've been a few years since I've seen it myself but I KNOW what I saw.

details.name: Pedro
details.description: I didn't know Sasquatch was in Austrailia but I have proof.

details.name: Marlee
details.description: It was 1999 and I was working late one the night of September 17th in the woods. I heard a strange noise. I saw Sasquatch.

details.name: Dave
details.description: I saw some tracks and followed them through the Adirondack mountains and there it was. Staring at me. I snapped a photo.
